TunableList.name: OWNER_STATES
TunableList.description: A list of items and states used for setting ownership states of plex mailboxes. This is contained within a list to protect against pack safe references.

TunableTuple.description: A set of states that will be set depending on whether the active household is the owner of a mailbox or not.

Tunable.name: active_state_value
Tunable.description: State to use when owned by active household.

Tunable.name: default_state_value
Tunable.description: Default state of mailbox, used if not owned by active household.

TunableList.name: definitions
TunableList.description: Only items with the specified definition(s) will have their states updated.
